languages.text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
languages.original_text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно от следующей атаки, наносящей {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (7): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −7 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

traits.locale_text: Enemies targeted by the Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional damage from the next physic attack. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} 7: Enemies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} 7: enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

languages.text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно от следующей атаки, наносящей {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (7): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −7 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора урона дополнительно от следующей пси-атаки. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 7: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −7 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

Противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора урона дополнительно от следующей пси-атаки. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} 7: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −7 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

languages.text: 受导航者能力影响的敌人，再次受到导航者攻击承受{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}时，此次攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}{/g}感知{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}加值。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（7）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低7点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 受导航者能力影响的敌人，再次受到导航者攻击承受{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}时，此次攻击会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}{/g}感知{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}加值。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（7）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低7点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知

languages.text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットになった敵は次の{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}サイキック{/g}攻撃から、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}分の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}(7)：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった敵は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−7が付与される。このペナルティはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5増加 認知力が+10増加
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 航宙士のパワーのターゲットになった敵に対し、次のサイキック攻撃から航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}分の追加ダメージを付与。 {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}7：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった敵に対し、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての能力に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−7を付与。ペナルティはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+5 認知力+10

languages.text: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes de navegante sufren + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional del siguiente ataque que inflija {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (7): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −7 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes de un navegante sufren +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante de daño adicional desde el siguiente ataque psíquico realizado. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} 7: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −7 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción

languages.text: Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Navigators zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch den nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}psionischen Angriff{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (7): Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −7 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden +Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} zusätzlichen Schaden durch den nächsten psionischen Angriff. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (7):Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften angegriffen werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −7 auf sämtliche Eigenschaften. Dieser Abzug addiert sich und wird jedes Mal, wenn er aufaddiert wird, bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung

languages.text: Les ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur subissent +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du navigateur points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires lors de l'{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}attaque physique{/g} suivante. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (7) : une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −7 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +10 de Perception
languages.original_text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du Navigateur subissent +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Navigateur points de dégâts supplémentaires lors de l'attaque psychique suivante. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} 7 : une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -7 s'applique à toutes les caractéristiques des ennemis ciblés par des pouvoirs du Navigateur jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de celui-ci. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du Navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +10 de Perception

languages.text: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
